Articles.Content: <figure data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" class="tmblr-full"><img data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" src="http://40.media.tumblr.com/301cb0bc17ca76a396dc75e2651dee4d/tumblr_inline_ntt82y4dMl1rr2wit_540.jpg"/></figure><figure data-orig-width="1920" data-orig-height="1080" class="tmblr-full"><img data-orig-width="1920" data-orig-height="1080" src="http://40.media.tumblr.com/858dc74f8ee8dfc374a44c6ec8e645f0/tumblr_inline_ntt82kP2pU1rr2wit_540.png"/></figure><p>Hellblazer surprises us again with this amazing wallpaper, landing at sunset! Hellblazer takes your screenshots to Photoshop and then comes back with these wallpapers. You can request your own in his <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107892"><b>forum thread</b></a>.<br/><br/></p>

Woah! I better get him to make my amazing* pictures even better!

*pictures may or may not be amazing initially

I should send him a screenshot or two to be made beautiful as well.

Also, this has been featured on a Fan Work Friday before.
